title: moving to overwatch
body: league is fun and all, but kinda to disheartening these days, i got banned at the beginning of the year for something i probably deserve, i dont really remember but its been so long since then, been behaving myself, cant get to honor level 2, i told myself if i cant get to honor level 2 by end of season ill switch to another game, but im going on holidays for some weeks in like 4 days, is it possible to make it to honor level 2 in that little time? am i doing something wrong? i cant play league for that long either since i have other things to do i dont think ill be able to make it

replies.body:
If you're doubting yourself you clearly don't want to move on from League.

YOU are the problem, not the game.

As harsh as it sounds - it's probably true.
how am i the problem if i do nothing bad?, not sounding salty haha, just want to know what you mean by that

> [{quoted}](name=midnyaa,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=M4yo8NrA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-10-18T01:26:31.727+0000)
>
> how am i the problem if i do nothing bad?, not sounding salty haha, just want to know what you mean by that

By "YOU are the problem" i mean that there's something that draws you to League - whether it be instant-gratification / dopamine or out of habit - you want to continue playing League because you don't really want to "switch to another game." From my perspective, it appears as though you're playing League for a predominant purpose of rewards in cosmetics... 

If the case be that you are addicted to League, i'd suggest thinking up of reasons that you like about League and go from there.

Otherwise, you shouldn't care about getting Level 2 honor because the honor system is designed to PUNISH you for misbehaving - just be a good samaritan and you'll eventually get Level 2 honor.
i sort of did the opposite to everyone 2 years ago. I moved from overwatch to league lol. i love league way more
